sentence.Network_en: She smiled at the incongruity of the question.
sentence.Network_cn: 面对这样突兀的问题，她笑了。

sentence.Network_en: The incongruity of the word'spirit " in his mouth struck him so sharply.
sentence.Network_cn: 从他嘴里说出不相称的“血气 ” 这两个字,真是强烈地感动了他.

sentence.Network_en: Cognitive dissonance is also applied to a perceived incongruity between a person's attitudes and his behaviour.
sentence.Network_cn: 认识分歧也用于指一个人的态度和他的行为之间可以看得出来的不一致.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... incompatible 不能和谐共存的 incongruity 不协调，不相称 inconstancy (指人)反复无常.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... incongruence 不协调 incongruity 不相称 inconscient 无意识的.
同义词与词根记忆_英语杂谈_天涯论坛 ... indefatigable a. 不知疲倦的 incongruity n. 不调和,不一致,不配合 acid 酸的.
张红岩TOEFL ... inconceivable adj. 不可思议的 incongruity n. 不和谐 incongruous adj. 不协调的.

entry.def: The incongruity of something is its strangeness when considered together with other aspects of a situation.

example.ex: She smiled at the incongruity of the question.
example.tran: 面对这样突兀的问题,她笑了。

example.ex: ...the almost absurd incongruity between her wealth and her lifestyle.
example.tran: 她的财富与生活方式之间几近荒谬的不相称

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of disagreeing; being unsuitable and inappropriate

means.word_mean: 不协调，不和谐；不一致；不适合，不相称

sentences.en: Ironically, even as the government was fulminating against American policy, American jeans and videocassettes were the hottest items in the stalls of the market, where the incongruity can be seen as an example of human inconsistency.
sentences.cn: 具有讽刺意味的是，甚至当政府正强烈谴责美国的政策时，美国牛仔裤和录像带却是市场的摊位上最抢手的商品，因为此处的前后不一致可被视为代表了人类的反复无常。
